title: I clicked a suspicous link
body: I can't change my password right unfortunately so I'm hoping someone can keep an eye on my account until I do change it later. Make sure nothing goes crazy on it. Did a virus sweep already and nothing came up also.

replies.body:
I would recommend finding a way to change your password ASAP, otherwise, you may lose access to your account entirely. Additionally, I suggest you take a look at the steps listed in our [**Protecting Your Account Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to ensure everything is configured for the best security.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thx

Edit: I just changed it as well.
